Title: The Car
Writer: Dan Fogelman (created by), Isaac Aptaker, Elizabeth Berger, Kay Oyegun (story editor), Jas Waters (staff writer)
Actors: Milo Ventimiglia, Mandy Moore, Sterling K. Brown, Chrissy Metz
Plot: The history of the Pearsons told through the life of the family car; Rebecca finds solace with an old friend.
